title: Silv Adc Lf Duo
body: i am  plat Support main tho wanting to play adc this season Looking for someone who wants to improve themselves and just have a good time climbing and wont get salty msg me here or ingame sorta looking for someone who understands the role they want to play and enjoy playing ranked {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: hey i m super keen ! add me on lol and i ll duo with you
